message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $140. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $130 is still a bit too low for me. How about $135? I'm willing to meet you halfway.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm trying to stay within my budget
Bob, I'm happy to work with you, but $125 is just below my minimum. I'm willing to go down to $130.  This is my final offer.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $128? I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product if we can meet at this price
